column4: i have a problem with ubuntu 9.10. whenever i install packages like g++, hardware drivers, the message "Please insert cd ubuntu 9.10.." or something like that.. but when i insert the installation cd (which created a dual OS), it says the same thing.. i can't connect to internet because i cant install the wireless drivers.. can someone help me?
disable the cdrom as source in System>admin>software sources
sorry that does no solve your problem ...
i tried that b4, the same thing happens, thanks anyway
